title: How to connect my PC to a smart TV - Quora

response.answer_text: most smart tv’s now have inbuilt chrome cast devices. you can check if your tv has chrome cast by seeing the specs of your smart tv. you can connect your laptop to the tv by wired or wireless connections. Wiredyou can use a HDMI cable to connect your laptop and tv. just simply select the HDMI source from your tv. for e.g. you plug the HDMI cable in HDMI 2 port, select HDMI 2 on your tv. wirelessif you have a chrome cast on your tv simply open chrome on your laptopselect the 3 dots on the top right corner you will find cast, just click it and your laptops screen will be seen on the TV.

If you prefer to do it wireless and on Windows 10, I may have something in store for you. I would first suggest you to be on the same network as your TV and make sure your PC is set to project a duplicate screen. (Select Win+P and you will see the options to project). When you’re done with the above settings, just select the option ‘Connect’ from the notifications bar to your right to connect your PC to an external device on your network and select your Smart TV from the list of devices listed. PS: The ‘Connect’ option will look something like this with the verb ‘connect’ on it.
